trialIndex.Description: Index of the current trial, used to align with EEG data when some EEG trigger lost.

left_option.Description: Clickable option on the left side on the screen.

right_option.Description: Clickable option on the right side on the screen.

response.Description: The side which the participant choose.

xTrajectory.Description: The x coordinate of the mouse trajectory over time.

yTrajectory.Description: The y coordinate of the mouse trajectory over time.

tTrajectory.Description: The time point which corrresdponds to the (x, y) coordinate series.

stimulus.Description: File name of the image stimulus.
